channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- CM Pop-Up Banners for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- CM Pop-Up Banners for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-5799|2024-09-12T06:00:02.912Z -- unknown -- cm%20pop-up%20banners%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The CM Pop-Up Banners for WordPress plugin before 1.7.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its popup fields, which could allow high privilege users such as Contributors to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
